ai.title: AI Integration
ai.subtitle: Configure AI-powered features for automated expense extraction
ai.enableAIDescription: Use local AI (LM Studio) to automatically extract data from receipt PDFs
ai.providerDescription: Select your AI provider (LM Studio recommended for local processing)
ai.apiUrlDescription: OpenAI-compatible API endpoint (e.g., LM Studio local server)
ai.apiKeyDescription: Optional API key for authentication (not required for LM Studio)
ai.modelDescription: The AI model to use for text extraction and parsing
ai.mcpServerUrlDescription: FastAPI MCP server endpoint for PDF text extraction
ai.mcpServerApiKeyDescription: Optional API key for MCP server authentication
ai.infoDescription: When enabled, the system will use your local LM Studio and MCP server to extract expense data from uploaded PDF receipts. This keeps all your data private and processed locally.
